name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A digital message board displaying handwritten messages from fans and staff, looping with background music.
An 'ATTENTION' screen displaying concert etiquette rules regarding lighting and cheering.
The digital message board loop continues with background music.
A wide shot of the Ariake Arena filled with audience members holding penlights. An announcement begins.

subtitles.original: ATTENTION: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください / 声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english: ATTENTION: Please be aware of flashing lights. / Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original: 本日は ReGLOSS 1st Live “Flashpoint” にご来場いただき、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for coming to ReGLOSS 1st Live "Flashpoint" today!
